post: Congratulations to David Edelman, a finalist for BRIs National Civics Teacher of the Year Award! David transforms his classroom into a laboratory for civic engagement,  guiding students through caucuses, debates, and action civics projects. 🔗 Check out how Davids inspiring his students:  https://bit.ly/41AZyhl  #CivicTeachers  #TeacherRecognition  #CivicEducation  #StudentVoice

Every flag tells a story 🇺🇸 Federal Flags, LLC produces American-made flags and flagpoles trusted by schools, businesses, and homeowners nationwide. Use code BRI5 to save, and help the Bill of Rights Institute provide free civic education. 🛒  https://bit.ly/3z2vhMW  #FederalFlags  #MadeInUSA  #CivicEducation  #SupportTeachers

⏰ Dont miss your chance! Florida students can showcase their community service projects, or pitch new ideas, at the MyImpact Challenge Civics Fair. Up to $2,000 in prizes! 📅 Oct. 11 | UCF | Register today:  https://bit.ly/45YV1rx Florida MyImpact Challenge is hosted by the Bill of Rights Institute thanks to our sponsor Travelers.  #FloridaStudents  #CivicEngagement  #ServiceLearning  #MyImpactChallenge

Why was the Constitution written? How has its meaning changed over time? In Civics on the Street, Professor Matthew Green breaks down the compromises, clauses, and evolving interpretations that still shape our democracy today. 🎥 Watch now:  https://bit.ly/45UHl0Z  #CivicEducation  #Constitution  #CivicEngagement

From enlisting in the Marine Corps just 3 days after turning 18 to founding Gunny Gear, July Francos story is one of grit, leadership, and civic responsibility. Watch her conversation with Gerald Gangaram in our Honoring Service series. 🎥  https://bit.ly/4mJDFFf  #HonoringService  #VeteranVoices  #Leadership  #CivicVirtues

⚡ Deadline extended! Texas students still have time to register for the MyImpact Challenge Civics Fair in Dallas. 📊 Showcase a service or entrepreneurship project + win $2,000 💡 Pitch an idea for your community + win $250 📅 Sept. 13 | Register:  https://bit.ly/41boZpC Texas MyImpact Challenge is hosted by the Bill of Rights Institute thanks to our sponsor Travelers.  #MyImpactChallenge  #TexasStudents  #ScholarshipOpportunity  #YouthLeadership  #FundingForStudents

Were grateful to Next Level Speech Therapy, P. C for supporting BRIs Civics for Everyone initiative. Their licensed SLPs provide in-person & teletherapy services so students with speech & language needs can engage fully in civic education. Learn how you can support our work: bit.ly/4jBYuQp  #CivicsForEveryone  #EdEquity  #SpeechTherapy  #Accessibility  #Inclusion

The Civic Star Challenge is here for the new school year 🎉 Teachers: bring the ideals of the Declaration of Independence into your classroom with ready-to-use lessons, and enter your class to win prizes. Over $200K is available this year! 🔗  https://bit.ly/3V1CQuX  #CivicEducation  #TeachingResources  #CivicStarChallenge  #BackToSchool

🧠 What happens when you challenge young people to change their communities? You get civic innovation and a whole lot of inspiration. This fall, the Bill of Rights Institute is bringing MyImpact Challenge Civics Fairs to Texas and Florida thanks to our sponsor Travelers. 📍 Dallas | Sept. 13 at the Dallas Holocaust and Human Rights Museum 📍 Orlando | Oct. 11 at the University of Central Florida At each event, students ages 13–19 will showcase service projects aligned with BRIs Founding Principles and Civic Virtues, or pitch ideas to earn seed funding for a project they believe in. 💡 Up to $2,000 in prizes 💡 2 ways to participate 💡 1 big opportunity to shape the future 🔗 Read the full announcement:  https://bit.ly/45W0b6v  #CivicEducation  #MyImpactChallenge  #YouthLeadership  #StudentVoice  #TexasStudents  #FloridaStudents  #EdLeadership  #StudentGrants

Veteran-owned and civics-aligned. Star Spangled Tea Coffee Co. offers regionally inspired blends with stories that honor Americas past. Use code BRI1791 to save while supporting civic education with every cup. 🍵 Shop here:  https://bit.ly/46ald2T  #TeaTime  #HistoryLovers  #VeteranOwned  #CivicEducation
